name: Brock Harrison
description: Expertly crafted by top chefs, the culinary creations—first introduced in their prestigious kitchens and enduring ever since—are made using locally sourced, sustainable ingredients. Choose from a selection of dishes that feature a variety of fresh herbs and spices, or opt for a custom menu tailored to your preferences.
